description:
House King Guestroom

Located on the second floor of the House, King Guestrooms are luxurious and cozy. They feature a king bed as well as a bathtub or standalone shower.

In addition to providing plenty of natural light, King Rooms also offer views of either the pool and orchard, Bridgehampton's Main Street, or Bridgehampton Historical Society and its surrounding greenery.

House Twin Guestroom

Nestled on the second and third floors of the House, Twin Rooms offer views of our historic Barn and our contemporary Pool.

Twin guest rooms offer the flexibility of two twin beds or one king bed, as well as a standalone shower and two large closets. They feature two window seats, perfect for curling up with a good book.

Amenities

While varied in location and aesthetic, accommodations at Hamptons luxury hotel Topping Rose House are equally elegant. Featuring contemporary design, each room is anchored by Madeline Weinrib's uniquely designed rugs.

You’ll Enjoy:

  • Plush bedding with linen by Frette
  • Bath towels by Matouk
  • Bathrobes by Chadsworth & Haig
  • Bath amenities by Farmaesthetics
  • Customizable minibars
  • Flat-screen televisions
  • 24-hour room service
